result.eng: There was a meeting in the morning and we continued to the pub in the evening.
result.ga: Bhí cruiniú ar siúl ar maidin agus lean muid ar aghaidh go dtí an teach tábhairne um thráthnóna
result.orig: Bhí cruiniú ar siúl ar maidin agus lean muid ar aghaidh go dtí an teach tábhairne um thráthnóna
result.html: Bhí cruiniú ar siúl ar maidin agus lean muid ar aghaidh go dtí an teach tábhairne um thráthnónaThere was a meeting in the morning and we continued to the pub in the evening.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí cruiniú ar siúl ar maidin agus lean muid ar aġaiḋ go dtí an teaċ táḃairne um ṫráṫnónaThere was a meeting in the morning and we continued to the pub in the evening.

result.eng: They were still working at this time last year.
result.ga: Bhí siad fós i mbun oibre um an dtaca seo an bhliain seo caite
result.orig: Bhí siad fós i mbun oibre um an dtaca seo an bhliain seo caite

result.ponchtml: Ḃí siad fós i mbun oibre um an dtaca seo an ḃliain seo caiteThey were still working at this time last year.

result.eng: She heard his voice around noon.
result.ga: Chuala sí a ghuth um nóin
result.orig: Chuala sí a ghuth um nóin
result.html: Chuala sí a ghuth um nóinShe heard his voice around noon.
result.ponchtml: Ċuala sí a ġuṫ um nóinShe heard his voice around noon.

result.eng: She had heard the story from her mother who was seventy at that time.
result.ga: Chuala sí an scéal óna máthair a bhí seasca bliain d'aois um an dtaca sin
result.orig: Chuala sí an scéal óna máthair a bhí seasca bliain d'aois um an dtaca sin
result.html: Chuala sí an scéal óna máthair a bhí seasca bliain d'aois um an dtaca sinShe had heard the story from her mother who was seventy at that time.
result.ponchtml: Ċuala sí an scéal óna máṫair a ḃí seasca bliain d'aois um an dtaca sinShe had heard the story from her mother who was seventy at that time.

result.eng: He visited his children, all of them married by that time.
result.ga: Chuir sé cuairt ar a chlann iad go léir pósta um an dtaca sin
result.orig: Chuir sé cuairt ar a chlann iad go léir pósta um an dtaca sin
result.html: Chuir sé cuairt ar a chlann iad go léir pósta um an dtaca sinHe visited his children, all of them married by that time.
result.ponchtml: Ċuir sé cuairt ar a ċlann iad go léir pósta um an dtaca sinHe visited his children, all of them married by that time.

result.eng: They organized a republican commemoration around Easter.
result.ga: D'eagraigh siad comóradh poblachtach um Cháisc
result.orig: D'eagraigh siad comóradh poblachtach um Cháisc
result.html: D'eagraigh siad comóradh poblachtach um CháiscThey organized a republican commemoration around Easter.
result.ponchtml: D'eagraiġ siad comóraḋ poblaċtaċ um ĊáiscThey organized a republican commemoration around Easter.

result.eng: He returned to Ireland around Christmas.
result.ga: D'fhill sé ar Éirinn um Nollaig
result.orig: D'fhill sé ar Éirinn um Nollaig
result.html: D'fhill sé ar Éirinn um NollaigHe returned to Ireland around Christmas.
result.ponchtml: D'ḟill sé ar Éirinn um NollaigHe returned to Ireland around Christmas.

result.ga: Ghuigh mé é um thrócaire
result.html: Ghuigh mé é um thrócaireI begged him for mercy.
result.ponchtml: Ġuiġ mé é um ṫrócaireI begged him for mercy.

result.html: Iarratasóirí um thearmannApplicants for asylum.

result.eng: It was revealed in Belfast in the morning and again in Dublin in the evening.

result.orig: Nochtadh i mBéal Feirste ar maidin é agus arís i mBaile Átha Cliath um thráthnóna

result.eng: The post would come at around 7:45 every morning.
result.ga: Tháinig an post isteach um 7 45 gach maidin
